column5: the Angkor Heritage Park Protection Unit returned the bag back to the owner after finding it at West Mebon.------According to the Angkor Wat Heritage Police

column11: and other items belonging to ------an unnamed 49-year-old man from Phnom Penh.------The bag has been returned to the owner.------http://cambodiapolice.com/policekh/137113
